scripts.build-all: npm link ../../library ../../ui-library && cd ../../library && npm run build && cd ../ui-library && npm run build-all && cd ../implementations/EpicGames && npm run build
scripts.build-dev-all: npm link ../../library ../../ui-library && cd ../../library && npm run build-dev && cd ../ui-library && npm run build-dev-all && cd ../implementations/EpicGames && npm run build-dev
